State gun permits climbing

The number of firearms licenses issued in Mass. has climbed by more than one-third in the past five years, a shift in a state known for its antigun reputation. (Globe)

Google Maps puts iPhone back in picture

Facing the future, or the dream of one

There were 19 shootings in Bowdoin-Geneva this year, but no one was killed. In this troubled area, that seems a step ahead. But progress, if real, feels fragile. (Globe)
